attributes.action: Abolish level crossings on all high speed rail lines, ie replace with bridges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Long term this is cheaper by far, ie virtually nil maintenance.
It is by far safer, who wants a car in the same area that a train?
It would help congestion in some regions which would in term help the environment, engines not running whilst stationary.
